blocks.heading: National Center for Wellness and Recovery
blocks.largeText: Addiction is a powerful disease hurting families and communities across America. The National Center for Wellness and Recovery (NCWR) is leading the charge to end the nation’s opioid crisis through scientific research, treatment and understanding.
blocks.smallText:
**#1 in addiction care and research.**

By researching the science of pain and addiction, we can bring new treatments and alternatives to the forefront of care.

blocks.heading: Our research is removing stigma and creating options.
blocks.body: Through $177.5M in funding generated by the 2019 State of Oklahoma settlement against a major pharmaceutical opioid manufacturer, the National Center for Wellness and Recovery is leading the nation in substance use disorder and pain research. With greater understanding comes greater solutions.

options.label: First responders
options.heading: First responders are in a special position to help.
options.body: We’re giving first responders more than our gratitude. Educational resources are available to help respond to opioid emergencies and stem the crisis.
